description.raw:
This PR should avoid problems with timing in the smoke test of Gazebo. Those problems were present [in this build](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-install_ubuntu_official-gazebo7_pkg-xenial-amd64/7/consoleFull#58390426331ee8289-5b13-4660-aeff-4eeabda42591) of gazebo7.

The PR also includes a change to avoid ALSA errors on gazebo runs \([like in this run](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-install_ubuntu_official-gazebo9_pkg-bionic-amd64/13/consoleFull#-52552005831ee8289-5b13-4660-aeff-4eeabda42591)\) mapping /dev/snd inside the container.

Final tests:

**gazebo7**

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-install_ubuntu_official-gazebo7_pkg-xenial-amd64&build=9)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-install\_ubuntu\_official-gazebo7\_pkg-xenial-amd64/9/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-install_ubuntu_official-gazebo7_pkg-xenial-amd64/9/))

**gazebo9**

![](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=gazebo-install_ubuntu_official-gazebo9_pkg-bionic-amd64&build=14)
[https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-install\_ubuntu\_official-gazebo9\_pkg-bionic-amd64/14/](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/gazebo-install_ubuntu_official-gazebo9_pkg-bionic-amd64/14/))

error is ok because the URL for the api of fueltools is broken.
